meanings.sent1: The tree started rebranching after the storm damaged its limbs.
meanings.sent2: The gardener is rebranching the shrub to promote new growth.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel watched in amusement as the tree began rebranching in different directions.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were rebranching like a tree reaching out in various directions.
meanings.sent5: The concept of rebranching can help us explore new possibilities and ideas.

meanings.definition: The act of forming new branches.
meanings.sent1: The rebranching of the plant created a fuller canopy.
meanings.sent2: We observed the rebranching of the tree after the spring season.
meanings.sent3: The rebranching of the company led to increased productivity.
meanings.sent4: The rebranching of the river symbolized growth and expansion.
meanings.sent5: The rebranching of the organization brought about fresh opportunities for development.
